name: urlshortener
title: URL Shortener API
description: Lets you create, inspect, and manage goo.gl short URLs

parameters.name: fields
parameters.desc: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

parameters.name: key
parameters.desc: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

parameters.name: oauth_token
parameters.desc: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

parameters.name: prettyPrint
parameters.desc: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

parameters.name: quotaUser
parameters.desc: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

parameters.name: userIp
parameters.desc: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.

fields.name: referrers
fields.desc: Top referring hosts, e.g. "www.google.com"; sorted by (descending) click counts. Only present if this data is available.

fields.name: shortUrlClicks
fields.desc: Number of clicks on this short URL.

fields.name: browsers
fields.desc: Top browsers, e.g. "Chrome"; sorted by (descending) click counts. Only present if this data is available.

fields.name: countries
fields.desc: Top countries (expressed as country codes), e.g. "US" or "DE"; sorted by (descending) click counts. Only present if this data is available.

fields.name: longUrlClicks
fields.desc: Number of clicks on all goo.gl short URLs pointing to this long URL.

fields.name: platforms
fields.desc: Top platforms or OSes, e.g. "Windows"; sorted by (descending) click counts. Only present if this data is available.

fields.name: allTime
fields.desc: Click analytics over all time.

fields.name: day
fields.desc: Click analytics over the last day.

fields.name: month
fields.desc: Click analytics over the last month.

fields.name: twoHours
fields.desc: Click analytics over the last two hours.

fields.name: week
fields.desc: Click analytics over the last week.

fields.name: count
fields.desc: Number of clicks for this top entry, e.g. for this particular country or browser.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: Label assigned to this top entry, e.g. "US" or "Chrome".

fields.name: analytics
fields.desc: A summary of the click analytics for the short and long URL. Might not be present if not requested or currently unavailable.

fields.name: created
fields.desc: Time the short URL was created; ISO 8601 representation using the yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZZ format, e.g. "2010-10-14T19:01:24.944+00:00".

fields.name: id
fields.desc: Short URL, e.g. "http://goo.gl/l6MS".

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: The fixed string "urlshortener#url".

fields.name: longUrl
fields.desc: Long URL, e.g. "http://www.google.com/". Might not be present if the status is "REMOVED".

fields.name: status
fields.desc: Status of the target URL. Possible values: "OK", "MALWARE", "PHISHING", or "REMOVED". A URL might be marked "REMOVED" if it was flagged as spam, for example.

fields.name: items
fields.desc: A list of URL resources.

fields.name: itemsPerPage
fields.desc: Number of items returned with each full "page" of results. Note that the last page could have fewer items than the "itemsPerPage" value.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: The fixed string "urlshortener#urlHistory".

fields.name: nextPageToken
fields.desc: A token to provide to get the next page of results.

fields.name: totalItems
fields.desc: Total number of short URLs associated with this user (may be approximate).

methods.name: list
methods.desc: Retrieves a list of URLs shortened by a user.

optinalQueryParams.name: start-token
optinalQueryParams.desc: Token for requesting successive pages of results.

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Expands a short URL or gets creation time and analytics.

requiredQueryParams.name: shortUrl
requiredQueryParams.desc: The short URL, including the protocol.

enum.name: FULL
enum.desc: Returns the creation timestamp and all available analytics.
